name: 末日火焰 布蘭德
description: 在符文之地荒廢之前，基恩．羅西曾是一名被部署到野火相當活躍的地區之搜救專家。當炸彈落下時，世界在一眨眼之間消失不見 — 連同基恩．羅西一起。留下的只有空蕩蕩的荒地 — 以及一個全身上下佈滿烈焰的怪異生物，自稱布蘭德。

wikiSkinData.lore: Before the devastation of Runeterra, Kegan Rodhe was a search-and-rescue specialist deployed to active wildfire zones. When the bombs went off, the world vanished in the blink of an eye—and Rodhe along with it. All that was left was the empty wasteland… and a monstrous creature of living flame, calling itself Brand.
